1.name: The Kid
1.description: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

2.name: Körkarlen
2.description: On New Year's Eve, the driver of a ghostly carriage forces a drunken man to reflect on his selfish, wasted life.

3.name: The Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse
3.description: An extended family split up in France and Germany find themselves on opposing sides of the battlefield during World War I.

4.name: Der müde Tod
4.description: When a woman's fiancé disappears, Death gives her three chances to save him from his fate.

5.name: The Sheik
5.description: A charming Arabian sheik becomes infatuated with an adventurous, modern-thinking Englishwoman and abducts her to his home in the Saharan desert.

6.name: Die Bergkatze
6.description: A charismatic lieutenant newly assigned to a remote fort is captured by a group of mountain bandits, thus setting in motion a madcap farce that is Lubitsch at his most unrestrained.

7.name: The Three Musketeers
7.description: The young Gascon D'Artagnan arrives in Paris, his heart set on joining the king's Musketeers. He is taken under the wings of three of the most respected and feared Musketeers, Porthos, ...                See full summary »

8.name: Orphans of the Storm
8.description: Two orphaned sisters are caught up in the turmoil of the French Revolution, encountering misery and love along the way.

9.name: Der Gang in die Nacht
9.description: Dr Eigil Borne is engaged to Hélène, a girl who is madly in love with him. At Hélène's birthday celebration, Eigil invites her to a cabaret, where he meets his other love, Lily, a passionate, fiery and funny dancer.

10.name: Schloß Vogelöd
10.description: In the castle Vogeloed, a few aristocrats are awaiting baroness Safferstätt. But first count Oetsch invites himself.. Everyone thinks he murdered his brother, baroness Safferstat's first ...                See full summary »

11.name: Little Lord Fauntleroy
11.description: An American boy turns out to be the long-lost heir of a British fortune. He is sent to live with the cold and unsentimental lord who oversees the trust.

13.name: Tol'able David
13.description: When three thuggish men are responsible for the death of his father and the crippling of his brother, young David must choose between supporting his family or risking his life and exacting vengeance.

14.name: Camille
14.description: A courtesan and an idealistic young man fall in love, only for her to give up the relationship at his status-conscious father's request.

15.name: Adventures of Tarzan
15.description: Tarzan spurns the love of La, Queen of Opar. When he isn't trying to keep the Bolshevik Rokoff and Clayton (pretender to the Greystoke estate) from reaching Opar, he is attacked ...                See full summary »

16.name: The Queen of Sheba
16.description: The story of the ill-fated romance between Solomon, king of Israel, and the Queen of Sheba.

17.name: Through the Back Door
17.description: When her mother remarries, a young Belgian girl is left behind with her nurse, but when Germany invades the country, she is sent to America to find her mother.

18.name: The Love Light
18.description: Angela maintains a coastal lighthouse in Italy, where she awaits the return of her brothers from the war. She learns they are casualties and takes solace in the arms of an American sailor ...                See full summary »

19.name: Vier um die Frau
19.description: Harry Yquem, a wealthy broker, remains obsessed with delusions of his devout wife's infidelity.

20.name: Drakula halála
20.description: A girl has frightening visions after visiting an insane asylum where one of the inmates claims to be Drakula and she can not be sure whether they were a nightmare or real.

21.name: Rich Girl, Poor Girl
21.description: Poor abused Nora runs into privileged bored Beatrice, while wandering onto the rich girl's family estate. Both girls notice the uncanny resemblance between each other, so they decide to ...                See full summary »

22.name: The Affairs of Anatol
22.description: Socialite Anatol Spencer seeks a better relation that he has with his wife. He sets up the friend of his youth Emilie in an apartment only to have her two-time him. He comforts the near ...                See full summary »

23.name: Johan
23.description: On a farm in up-country Sweden, an enigmatic stranger comes to a conservative peasant community and seduces a farmer's wife.

24.name: Miss Lulu Bett
24.description: A once-timid young woman gains newfound confidence after a failed marriage, much to the chagrin of her miserable family.

26.name: The Ace of Hearts
26.description: A romantic rivalry among members of a secret society becomes even tenser when one of the men is assigned to carry out an assassination.

27.name: Rip Van Winkle
27.description: The story shows the development of the united state in divergent fields : Political, social and even economic field.

28.name: Hamlet
28.description: Danish silent movie-star Asta Nielsen formed her own production company to make this film, in which new elements are combined with features (and a few lines) familiar from Shakespeare's ...                See full summary »

29.name: Das indische Grabmal erster Teil - Die Sendung des Yoghi

30.name: Eldorado
30.description: Sibilla is a single mother, working as a gypsy dancer in a lousy cafe in the south of Spain. Unable to keep with the costs of his son's medical bills, she asks for help to Estiria, her ...                See full summary »

31.name: Seven Years Bad Luck
31.description: After breaking a mirror in his home, superstitious Max tries to avoid situations which could bring bad luck-- but in doing so, causes himself the worst luck imaginable.

32.name: A Sailor-Made Man
32.description: An idle, wealthy playboy foolishly joins the Navy when the father of the girl he wants to marry tells him to get a job to prove himself worthy.

33.name: Buried Treasure
33.description: Strung around the idea of reincarnation, this film goes back in time to the days of the Spanish galleons and pirates burying their treasure; treasure to be found centuries later.

34.name: Enchantment
34.description: The frothy experiences of a vain little flapper. Her father induces an actor friend to become a gentlemanly cave man and the film becomes another variation of the 'Taming of the Shrew' ...                See full summary »

35.name: Sehnsucht
35.description: A young Russian dancer in Geneva returns to Russia, where he falls in love with a grand duchess. He is arrested but manages to escape.

37.name: The Blot
37.description: The Professor dispenses the wisdom of the ages and does not make a living wage. The sons of the rich and powerful are students lacking any motivation. The next door neighbor of the ...                See full summary »

41.name: The Four Feathers
41.description: A 'coward' resigns his commission and poses as an Arab to save his former comrades.

42.name: Sappho
42.description: Richard De La Croix has a brother, Andreas, who has been driven insane by a notorious vamp and socialite named Sappho. A man-about-town named Teddy takes Richard to the Odeon to meet her, ...                See full summary »

43.name: Das indische Grabmal zweiter Teil - Der Tiger von Eschnapur
43.description: Howard is infected with leprosy, Mac Allen was captured by the Maharadsha, and now the Maharadsha offers Irene a deal: one night for letting healing Howard. She accepts, but when she tries ...                See full summary »

44.name: The Sky Pilot
44.description: The sky pilot is a preacher who helps Gwen walk again after a near-fatal accident.

45.name: L'Atlantide
45.description: Two men, lost in the desert, meet Queen Antinea, ruler of Atlantis.

46.name: The Conquering Power
46.description: After losing his father, a playboy moves in with his miserly uncle, who seeks to cheat him out of his inheritance.

47.name: De zwarte tulp
47.description: In Holland a Royalist jails the ruler's son to obtain the secret of black tulips.

48.name: Brewster's Millions
48.description: Monte Brewster learns that he has inherited $10 million from his late grandfather, but then learns that he must spend $2 million in less than a year and remain unmarried to inherit the rest of the money.

49.name: A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court
49.description: In 1921, a young man, having read Mark Twain's classic novel of the same title, dreams that he himself travels to King Arthur's court, where he has similar adventures and outwits his foes ...                See full summary »
